code: import React,{useState}from'react';import portfolioData from'../data/portfolioData.json';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Portfolio.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Portfolio(){const[category,setCategory]=useState('All');const navigate=useNavigate();const categories=['All',...new Set(portfolioData.map(item=>item.category))];const filtered=category==='All'?portfolioData:portfolioData.filter(item=>item.category===category);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"portfolio-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-buttons",children:categories.map(cat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:category===cat?'active':'',onClick:()=>setCategory(cat),children:cat},cat))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"portfolio-grid",children:filtered.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"portfolio-card",onClick:()=>navigate("/portfolio/".concat(item.id)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title})]},item.id))})]});}export default Portfolio;
